'''I Came, I Saw, I Conquered''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by collecting [[Local Specialty|regional specialties]] in another player's world.

==Achievements==
{{Achievements by Category Table|I Came, I Saw, I Conquered}}
<!--
==Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* "I Came, I Saw, I Conquered" is the English translation of ''{{w|veni, vidi, vici}}'' &mdash; a Latin phrase that is popularly attributed to {{w|Julius Caesar}}.
